entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 5:23PM AKST until January 22 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...SNOW CONTINUES ACROSS THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE... .Snowfall continues across the northern panhandle with some pockets of freezing rain along the transition zone between Kake and along the outer coast to Yakutat. Over the inner channels near Juneau, snow has started to become wetter but remaining cold enough to stay as snow.
